programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Elmo, Tamir, Charlie, Julia, and Cookie Monster are making self-portraits in the community garden with Kayla. Kayla guides them to look into the mirror and notice the beautiful things that make you, you! Everyone looks at themselves in the mirror and starts drawing what they see. They also learn their identity is about what you love to do. So, they add onto their self-portraits and then share their drawings with each other. Cookie Monster draws his blue fur, his googly eyes, and cookies. Charlie draws her blue eyes, curly blonde hair, tap shoes, and challah bread because it's one of her favorite Jewish foods. Julia draws her straight hair, musical notes, paw prints, and her dog Rose. Elmo draws his red fur, orange nose, a piano, and watering a flower with Abby because being a kind neighbor is part of Elmo's identity. Tamir draws his brown skin, coily hair, comic books, and some veggies as he loves gardening in the community garden. There are so many special things that make you, you!

programme.title: Gods Of Honour
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a 'Fire master' in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING's third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. NAR JAR pulls himself together again under his mother and friends' help and fights against ZHOU's army for the civilians.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60's in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development. He, KEUNG and HUI MAN BILL (Chan Kam Hung, Sunny) organized a development company and earned their first bucket of gold. When TIM was happy with his achievement, his enemy had broken his brother's legs. TIM suffered a great blow and decided to reform. On the other hand, BILL, stressed on principle, was surprised to find that his respected master in fact was corrupt.

programme.title: Roadside Station Guide XIII
programme.desc: Japan has over a thousand â€œMichi-no-Ekiâ€� (roadside stations), providing drivers with convenient rest stops along their journeys. These stations are also gateways for exploring the unique characteristics of nearby areas, offering opportunities to discover local specialties, cuisine, and cultural surprises. Wong Yau-nam and Leung Wan-yu set out on a self-driving tour, visiting thirteen distinctive Michi-no-Eki in the Kanto region and traveling along the â€œRomantic Roadâ€� that connects places like Tochigi and Gunma Prefectures, embarking on a new kind of travel experience. After stopping at a rest area known as a hidden â€œdessert paradise,â€� they ventured into orchards to pick and eat seasonal fruits on the spot, and sampled photogenic wagashi (Japanese confections) and fruit-flavored shaved ice. They also explored a rest stop featuring a collection of Mashiko pottery, enjoyed the ambiance of a Mashiko ware teahouse, and visited a sake brewery to savor local sake.

programme.title: ESG Decoded
programme.desc: A sustainable future is a shared goal for Hong Kong as a whole, and financial investment and technological development play crucial roles in this process. "The Breakthrough Code: ESG" will take viewers to the TVB Green Summit to hear industry representatives share insights on the opportunities and new normal brought about by low-carbon transformation. Furthermore, hosts Wu Tianyou and Guan Fengxin will visit local university scholars to learn about the development of environmental technologies, including how to recycle waste and reduce carbon emissions, allowing the public to understand how government, business, and academia can work together to promote Hong Kong's sustainable development. With increasingly frequent extreme weather events, green transformation and sustainable development have become an irreversible trend. The TVB Green Summit brings together political and business elites from Hong Kong and Macau to discuss the new trend of environmental protection and plastic reduction in the tourism industry, and how cross-industry cooperation can effectively promote green transformation. The program will provide in-depth analysis. Tianyou and Fengxin will also introduce how to practice low-carbon living in clothing, food, housing, and transportation, encouraging everyone to achieve carbon neutrality.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again. Second son Zhong (Ekin Cheng), returning from abroad, brings his close girlfriend Xi (Chan Miu-ying), shattering Mei's (Chen Songling) dream of him. Shadowed by her parents' divorce, Xi eventually breaks up with Zhong. Meanwhile, Mei regains her confidence and charm. Zhong begins to admire Mei, but Mei has already joined her good friend Hao (Louis Koo). Youngest daughter Tung (Lam Chi-kwan), a bright and clever girl, marries the promising young man Tung (Wong Kai-tak). However, under her father's strict control, she dares not reveal her relationship with Tung. Can each of them fulfill their dreams and find a good home?

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu. But he realizes Sheung Siu has hooked up with lawyer Tai Ching-kwan (Joe Ma) and gang boss Tai Ching-yan (Pierre Ngo). He also finds out his colleague and also buddy Chun Wing-hei (Mat Yeung) used to go out with Sheung Siu. The duo keep a close watch on the Tai brothers as they want to get her back on the straight and narrow. Au Yeung Chung and Ching-kwan have different values. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects. Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

Led by local Japanese food experts, the program guides "Japan expert" Zhou Yiwei and "travel program newbie" Wang Minyi to hidden gems - restaurants not featured in travel guides or simply unassuming eateries. Beyond uncovering these hidden gems, the food experts provide food information and share their personal tips for enjoying the food. Furthermore, each episode will explore different themes such as "dreams" and "husband-and-wife teams," revealing heartwarming stories behind the restaurants. Join us on this culinary journey to savor the diverse flavors of the Kansai region of Japan.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again. Second son Zhong (Ekin Cheng), returning from abroad, brings his close girlfriend Xi (Chan Miu-ying), shattering Mei's (Chen Songling) dream of him. Shadowed by her parents' divorce, Xi eventually breaks up with Zhong. Meanwhile, Mei regains her confidence and charm. Zhong begins to admire Mei, but Mei has already joined her good friend Hao (Louis Koo). Youngest daughter Tung (Lam Chi-kwan), a bright and clever girl, marries the promising young man Tung (Wong Kai-tak). However, under her father's strict control, she dares not reveal her relationship with Tung. Can each of them fulfill their dreams and find a good home?

programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu. But he realizes Sheung Siu has hooked up with lawyer Tai Ching-kwan (Joe Ma) and gang boss Tai Ching-yan (Pierre Ngo). He also finds out his colleague and also buddy Chun Wing-hei (Mat Yeung) used to go out with Sheung Siu. The duo keep a close watch on the Tai brothers as they want to get her back on the straight and narrow. Au Yeung Chung and Ching-kwan have different values. programme.title: The Defected
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects. Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

Masuk ke dunia yang membimbangkan "Invoking 3: Paranormal Dimensions," di mana mayat hidup datang untuk mendatangkan malapetaka kepada yang masih hidup. Grim Reapers, poltergeists jahat, kuasa syaitan dan roh yang disihir akan menghilangkan ketakutan anda dan mengheret anda ke dalam jurang mimpi buruk yang terjaga.
